titles: The Watermen and Lightermen's case in relation to the bill before this honourable House for the explanation of former laws made touching wherrymen and watermen, and joyning the lightermen to them, and providing one good government for both.
author: Watermen and Lightermen of the River Thames (Guild)
notes: Reproduction of the original in the California State Library, Sutro branch.
keywords: Watermen and Lightermen of the River Thames (Guild)
